definition: someone who is physiologically dependent on a substance, to cause someone or oneself to become dependent on something, especially a narcotic drug
details:
noun
- someone who is physiologically dependent on a substance
- someone who is so ardently devoted to something that it resembles an addiction
= example: someone who is so ardently devoted to something that it resembles an addiction
= synonyms: nut
verb
- to cause someone or oneself to become dependent on something, especially a narcotic drug
= example: to cause someone or oneself to become dependent on something, especially a narcotic drug
= synonyms: hook
